sys_hub_action_type_definition.description:
Creates an invoice document in SAP ECC – RFC.

Inputs :

  • Connection Alias - Connection alias for SAP ECC - RFC.
  • Select BAPI - Option to select either standard or custom BAPI.
  • Invoice Header - Complex object containing these fields:
    • Invoice - Sample Unit : X
    • Document Type - Sample Unit : RE
    • Document Date - Sample Unit : 20220912
    • Posting Date - Sample Unit : 20220912
    • Company Code - Sample Unit : 1000
    • Currency - Sample Unit : EUR
    • Gross Invoice Amount - Sample Unit : 10
    • Terms of Payment - Sample Unit : 0001
    • Reference
    • Invoicing Party
    • ISO Code
    • Direct Quoted Exchange Rate
    • Indirect Quoted Exchange Rate
    • Calculate Tax
    • Baseline Payment Date
    • Cash Discount Days 1
    • Cash Discount Days 2
    • Days Net
    • Cash Discount Percentage 1
    • Cash Discount Percentage 2
    • IV Category
    • Document Header Text
    • Payment Block
    • Unplanned Delivery Costs
    • Tax code for Delivery Costs
    • Jurisdiction Code
    • Created by
    • Payment Method
    • Payment Method Supplement
    • Document Number of an Invoice Document
    • SCB Indicator
    • Supplying Country
    • Service Indicator
    • Reference
    • Discount Amount
    • PBC/POR number
    • Check Digit
    • POR Reference Number
    • Payee
    • Partner Bank Type
    • House Bank
    • Assignment
    • Payment Reference
    • Invoice Reference: Document Number for Invoice Reference
    • Fiscal Year
    • Invoice Receipt Date
    • Planning Level
    • Planning Date
    • Fixed
    • Business Area
    • Lot Number
    • Text
    • Nota Fiscal Type
    • EU Triangular Deal
    • Reporting Country
    • VAT Registration Number
    • Business Place
    • Rate for Taxes
    • Investment ID
    • Due Date for Retention (Default)
    • Posting Logic for Delivery Items (Invoice/Credit Memo)
    • Posting Logic for Returns Items (Invoice/Credit Memo)
    • Transaction
    • Simulate Invoice
  • Invoice Lines - Objects containing these fields:
    • Invoice Item - Sample Unit : 000001
    • Purchase Order - Sample Unit : 4500020425
    • Item - Sample Unit : 00010
    • Amount - Sample Unit : 10
    • Quantity - Sample Unit : 10
    • Order Unit - Sample Unit : ST
    • Tax Code
    • Reference Document
    • Year Current Period
    • Item of a Reference Document
    • Indicator: Subsequent Debit/Credit
    • Tax Jurisdiction
    • Order Unit in ISO
    • Quantity in Purchase Order Price Unit
    • Order Price Unit
    • Purchase Order Price Unit in ISO Code
    • Condition Type
    • Step Number
    • Counter
    • Entry Sheet
    • Text
    • Final Invoice
    • Line Number
    • GR/IR Clearing
    • Vendor
    • Indicator: Line Item Not Liable to Cash Discount
    • Retention in Document Currency
    • Retention in Percent
    • Due Date for Retention
    • Item Not Relevant to Retention
    • Valuation Type
    • Grouping Characteristic for Invoice Verification
    • Origin of an Invoice Item
  • Additional Fields - Additional fields or values you want to add to the details. These fields are retrieved dynamically from SAP ECC - RFC.

Outputs :

  • Invoice Details - Invoice document details.
  • Status - If the request is executed successfully, Status is set to “Success”. If there is a failure in SAP ECC - RFC, Status is set to “Error”.
  • Error Message - Reason for error as returned from SAP ECC - RFC in the RETURN object. Populated only when an error occurs.

Error Messages :

  • Encountered an error. Check log for more details.

 

To use this action, the corresponding SAP ECC - RFC connection and credential must be created and associated with the SAP_ECC Connection & Credential alias. Learn More

 

Note: Requires a subscription for production use. Read More.

sys_hub_action_type_snapshot.description:
Creates an invoice document in SAP ECC – RFC.

Inputs :

  • Connection Alias - Connection alias for SAP ECC - RFC.
  • Select BAPI - Option to select either standard or custom BAPI.
  • Invoice Header - Complex object containing these fields:
    • Invoice - Sample Unit : X
    • Document Type - Sample Unit : RE
    • Document Date - Sample Unit : 20220912
    • Posting Date - Sample Unit : 20220912
    • Company Code - Sample Unit : 1000
    • Currency - Sample Unit : EUR
    • Gross Invoice Amount - Sample Unit : 10
    • Terms of Payment - Sample Unit : 0001
    • Reference
    • Invoicing Party
    • ISO Code
    • Direct Quoted Exchange Rate
    • Indirect Quoted Exchange Rate
    • Calculate Tax
    • Baseline Payment Date
    • Cash Discount Days 1
    • Cash Discount Days 2
    • Days Net
    • Cash Discount Percentage 1
    • Cash Discount Percentage 2
    • IV Category
    • Document Header Text
    • Payment Block
    • Unplanned Delivery Costs
    • Tax code for Delivery Costs
    • Jurisdiction Code
    • Created by
    • Payment Method
    • Payment Method Supplement
    • Document Number of an Invoice Document
    • SCB Indicator
    • Supplying Country
    • Service Indicator
    • Reference
    • Discount Amount
    • PBC/POR number
    • Check Digit
    • POR Reference Number
    • Payee
    • Partner Bank Type
    • House Bank
    • Assignment
    • Payment Reference
    • Invoice Reference: Document Number for Invoice Reference
    • Fiscal Year
    • Invoice Receipt Date
    • Planning Level
    • Planning Date
    • Fixed
    • Business Area
    • Lot Number
    • Text
    • Nota Fiscal Type
    • EU Triangular Deal
    • Reporting Country
    • VAT Registration Number
    • Business Place
    • Rate for Taxes
    • Investment ID
    • Due Date for Retention (Default)
    • Posting Logic for Delivery Items (Invoice/Credit Memo)
    • Posting Logic for Returns Items (Invoice/Credit Memo)
    • Transaction
    • Simulate Invoice
  • Invoice Lines - Objects containing these fields:
    • Invoice Item - Sample Unit : 000001
    • Purchase Order - Sample Unit : 4500020425
    • Item - Sample Unit : 00010
    • Amount - Sample Unit : 10
    • Quantity - Sample Unit : 10
    • Order Unit - Sample Unit : ST
    • Tax Code
    • Reference Document
    • Year Current Period
    • Item of a Reference Document
    • Indicator: Subsequent Debit/Credit
    • Tax Jurisdiction
    • Order Unit in ISO
    • Quantity in Purchase Order Price Unit
    • Order Price Unit
    • Purchase Order Price Unit in ISO Code
    • Condition Type
    • Step Number
    • Counter
    • Entry Sheet
    • Text
    • Final Invoice
    • Line Number
    • GR/IR Clearing
    • Vendor
    • Indicator: Line Item Not Liable to Cash Discount
    • Retention in Document Currency
    • Retention in Percent
    • Due Date for Retention
    • Item Not Relevant to Retention
    • Valuation Type
    • Grouping Characteristic for Invoice Verification
    • Origin of an Invoice Item
  • Additional Fields - Additional fields or values you want to add to the details. These fields are retrieved dynamically from SAP ECC - RFC.

Outputs :

  • Invoice Details - Invoice document details.
  • Status - If the request is executed successfully, Status is set to “Success”. If there is a failure in SAP ECC - RFC, Status is set to “Error”.
  • Error Message - Reason for error as returned from SAP ECC - RFC in the RETURN object. Populated only when an error occurs.

Error Messages :

  • Encountered an error. Check log for more details.

 

To use this action, the corresponding SAP ECC - RFC connection and credential must be created and associated with the SAP_ECC Connection & Credential alias. Learn More

 

Note: Requires a subscription for production use. Read More.
